snippet: A police spokesman said two officers fired at a woman after she refused to drop her weapon and advanced toward the officers.
lead_paragraph: A police spokesman said two officers fired at a woman after she refused to drop her weapon and advanced toward the officers.

headline.main: Police Kill Woman Holding Knife in Midtown
headline.print_headline: Police Kill Woman Holding Knife In Midtown
headline.seo: N.Y.C. Police Kill Woman Brandishing a Knife
